title: As a BOC Admin, I want Reason for Placement on COVID IL (MN) Updated
custom_steps:
AC:

* The following values will be removed from the Reason for Placement dropdown on the MN COVID IL placement:
** _Close Contact_
** _Symptomatic_
** _Required Intake_
* Previous placements will not be impacted by this change
** Any past placement using these values will retain them

title: As a User, I want there to be a new minor league Administrative Leave List Roster Status
custom_steps:
Rules: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2459893761/21.+Place+on+Administrative+Leave+List|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2459893761/21.+Place+on+Administrative+Leave+List|smart-link]

* This roster status will appear on profiles and widgets
* The roster status will be searchable
* The roster status will appear on reports

title: As a User, I want to create a new minor league Administrative Leave List Placement
custom_steps:
Wire: [https://r6vcv1.axshare.com/#p=place_on_military_list|https://r6vcv1.axshare.com/#p=place_on_military_list|smart-link] 

Rules: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2459893761/21.+Place+on+Administrative+Leave+List|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2459893761/21.+Place+on+Administrative+Leave+List|smart-link] 

Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2459926529/Data+Discovery+-+Administrative+Leave+List|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2459926529/Data+Discovery+-+Administrative+Leave+List|smart-link] 

AC:

* There will be a new MN Inactive List Transaction "Place on Administrative Leave List"
* Selecting this transaction from the Create New menu will load a new Administrative Leave List placement transaction
* This tx will follow the Military List placement as a template
* The transaction will have standard button options:
** Save
** Save and Run Rule Check
** Submit
** Cancel
* The new transaction will be searchable
* These placements will appear on player histories
* BOC will be notified on submission and be able to approve
* BOC will subsequently be able to Reverse and Reverse and Suppress

title: As a Social Media user I want to see a new social media accordion on the domestic amateur profile info tab for professional players
custom_steps:
*Wireframe:*[https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=info&g=1|https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=info&g=1] NOTE: wire is for pro, but the same accordion should be on the domestic profile

AC:

* If the user has permission to social media monitoring for domestic amateurs then there will be a new â€˜Social Mediaâ€™ accordion on the domestic player profile info tab for professional players.
* The accordion will contain a list of the player's social media handles followed by a â€œSocial Media Reportsâ€� table listing which contains the following columns:
** Report date - this will be a link to open the actual report in viral nation
** Org
** Safety Score
* For a club user the visible reports should only be those which were requested by the club
* BOC Users will see all reports for the player
* The reports will be sorted by report date with the most recent report at the top
* In the current draft year, if the player is marked as â€˜not eligibleâ€™, â€˜not subjectâ€™, or their current draft year record is deleted then if they have an existing report created since the last r4 draft signing deadline then that report should not be listed

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Dugout Change Log to capture when an employee is added AND designated as On Field
custom_steps:
Context: If an employee is added to the Eligible For Dugout utility and designated as On Field at the same time, the Change Log only captures the addition

AC:

* If an employee is added and designated as On Field at the same time, the change log will capture both actions
* These actions can be captured as separate line items in the log

* This change will also impact past updates (no need to retain any mention of â€œuniform designationâ€�

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to disable MN COVID IL Placements
custom_steps:
AC:

* Users will no longer be able to create a MN COVID IL Placement
** The option will be removed from the Create New menu for all Users
* MN Reinstate from IL transaction will be updated to remove mention of COVID IL
* Users will no longer be able to create a Transfer to COVID IL (Minors) transaction
** The option will be removed from the Create New menu for all Users

title: As a BOC Admin, I want EBIS to consume SFD info from EMR so the Recert Maintenance Utility Is Accurate
custom_steps:
AC:

There will be a new endponit created for EMR to call and update with the following information:

* EBISID
* InitialPlacementDate
* RecertDateCovered

This data will be used to update the IL Recertification utility and accompanying report

The endpoint will be: /ebis2-core-services/emr/sfd

It will consume a POST body in the following format:

{code:json}{
    "playerId":111111,
    "initialPlacementDtAsString":"",
    "recertDtAsString":""
}
{code}

recertDtAsString should be left blank or null when updating the initial placement. 

initialPlacementDtAsString can not be null and should always be populated.

If a recert does not yet exist for a placement when the endpoint is called then upon creating the recert the â€˜received SFDâ€™ checkbox will be checked by default.  

When sending the initial placement or a recert that already exists the entity will have its received SFD checkbox checked and any open action items about the missing SFD will be closed.

title: Social Media reports for domestic amateurs created by club users should cease to show to that club following the draft or signing deadline
custom_steps:
If a club requests a social media screening report for a player they can only see that screening up until the upcoming R4 Draft - at which point if they do not draft the player the screening will disappear from both the social media monitoring widget and the social media section of the domestic amateur profile when viewed by the club.  If the club does draft the player, they will continue to see the screening report until the R4 signing deadline.  After the deadline, if the club has NOT signed the player the screening report will no longer be visible to the club user.  If the player IS signed then the screening report will continue to show for that club on the players now professional profile.



AC

* Domestic Amateur social media screening reports will show up until the R4 draft end date for the year in which the report is created (based on the R4 signing deadline - prior to the deadline draft year is the current year, after the deadline the draft year is the next year)
* After the R4 draft end date: if the club has not drafted the player, they will no longer see the screening report
* After the R4 draft end date: If the club HAS drafted the player then they will continue to see the screening report
* If at any time the club signs their drafted player with a report, they will continue to see that report in the playerâ€™s professional profile
* After the R4 signing deadline: if the player has NOT been signed by the club they will no longer see the screening report
* BOC will always see the old screening reports on the domestic amateur profile.  
* The widget only shows the current yearâ€™s screening reports, so after the signing deadline all old ones will no longer be seen there for any user

title: As a developer, I want each build and deployment of ebis to automatically break browser caches
custom_steps:
The build process for ebis should update a cachebuster with each build to enforce a redownload of all javascript and css files. 

Files to invalidate: main.js, ebislogin.js, ebis.css

title: As an EBIS User, I want Employee Transactions Displayed on the Player History page of their profile
custom_steps:
Context: Currently, employee transactions are not being displayed in the Player History of profiles.

AC:

* The following Employees transactions will be displayed on the Player History:
** Assign as 7th coach
** Assign/Reassign Employee
** Deceased List
** Ineligible List
** Offseason Assignment
** Reinstate from Inactive List
** Remove as 7th Coach
** Remove Employee from Org
** Suspended List
** Temporarily Inactive List
* Visibility will be consistent with player transactions
** Approved transactions will be visible to all users with employee permissions
** Less than Approved transactions will only be visible to BOC and the employees Org
* Display will be consistent with player transactions
** Approved tx will be in black
** Submitted tx will be in green
** Prelim tx will be in red

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download
